Summary:
The team discussed the status of the upcoming Shanghai upgrade. The mainnet deployment is scheduled for June 8th and devnet has been deployed successfully. 

A new version of the consensus layer client (CL) was released, which includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

There are still some issues with the execution layer's (EL) implementation of EIP-4844 that need to be addressed before mainnet deployment can proceed.

The team is working on a plan for post-Shanghai upgrade testing.
